Pre-Game Insights: Mavericks coach Jason Kidd said the team will assess how Doncic feels on Monday before declaring his status for Tuesday's NBA Cup game against the New Orleans Pelicans.
Kidd said he expects the pace to be faster with Irving slotted as the primary point guard as opposed to Doncic.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dallas' road trip to Oklahoma City is the second game of a back-to-back, closing out a busy weekend that included a 110-93 win over the San Antonio Spurs.
Doncic played only 28 minutes against San Antonio on Saturday night, posting 16 points, six rebounds and six assists.
Others: Mavericks star Luka Doncic (knee contusion) set to miss Sunday night meeting with Thunder
Doncic cautiously admitted he was 'a little less' than 100% when asked about his health status following Saturday's lopsided win over the Spurs.
